entry.title: Fix the Issue of GitHub Pages Does Not Pick Up the Latest Changes
entry.summary:
Things on this page are fragmentary and immature notes/thoughts of the author. Please read with your own judgement!

I encountered the issue that some pages pushed to my GitHub repository dclong/en does not show up when I visit the built web site. The issue was fixed by switch â€¦
entry.content:
Things on this page are fragmentary and immature notes/thoughts of the author. Please read with your own judgement!

I encountered the issue that some pages pushed to my GitHub repository dclong/en does not show up when I visit the built web site. The issue was fixed by switch from the branch gh-pages to the branch master.
